post:
Hello LET community,

Here is our latest offer for those LET folks who have not checked out the main site recently. You can view the actual article and comments <a href="http://www.lowendbox.com/blog/securedspeed-256mb-3-90mo-openvz-vps-in-los-angeles/">here</a>.

These are OpenVZ/SolusVM and will be provisioned in Los Angeles at QuadraNET.

**VPS TWO Plan**

**256MB** Guaranteed/384MB Burstable RAM
15GB RAID 10 Storage
400GB Transfer
Free Instant Setup
**$3.90**/month with PROMO CODE "**LEBSPRING2**"  <a href="https://clients.securedspeed.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=2">Order Link</a>

**VPS THREE Plan**

**512MB** Guaranteed/768MB Burstable RAM
25GB RAID 10 Storage
500GB Transfer
Free Instant Setup
**$5.40**/month with PROMO CODE "**LEBSPRING3**"  <a href="https://clients.securedspeed.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=1">Order Link</a>

Test IP and File: http://173.254.231.3/100mb.test

<pre>[root@testvps ~]# dd if=/dev/zero of=test bs=64k count=16k conv=fdatasync; rm test
16384+0 records in
16384+0 records out
1073741824 bytes (1.1 GB) copied, 7.13438 s, 151 MB/s</pre>

If you have any questions, feel free to contact us (thru the site ideally; you will get a faster response).

Thanks for all the support and great feedback. :) Enjoy.
